allMenuItems.name: Pad Thai
allMenuItems.description: Classic Thai stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, eggs, and bean sprouts, seasoned with tamarind sauce and served with crushed peanuts and lime

allMenuItems.name: Sushi Roll
allMenuItems.description: Fresh fish and seasoned rice wrapped in nori seaweed, often including avocado, cucumber, and tobiko, served with wasabi and pickled ginger

allMenuItems.name: Margherita Pizza
allMenuItems.description: Traditional Neapolitan pizza topped with San Marzano tomatoes, fresh buffalo mozzarella, basil leaves, and extra virgin olive oil on a thin crust

allMenuItems.name: Beef Burger
allMenuItems.description: Juicy ground beef patty with melted cheese, fresh lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and pickles, served on a toasted brioche bun with special sauce

allMenuItems.name: Caesar Salad
allMenuItems.description: Crispy romaine lettuce tossed in creamy Caesar dressing with shaved parmesan cheese, crunchy croutons, and optional grilled chicken or anchovies

allMenuItems.name: Tom Yum Goong
allMenuItems.description: Hot and sour Thai soup with jumbo shrimp, mushrooms, lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, galangal, and chili paste, garnished with cilantro

allMenuItems.name: Paella
allMenuItems.description: Traditional Spanish rice dish made with saffron, mixed seafood, chorizo, and vegetables, cooked in a large flat pan until crispy on the bottom

allMenuItems.name: Ramen
allMenuItems.description: Japanese noodle soup featuring rich pork bone broth, tender chashu pork, soft-boiled egg, nori, bamboo shoots, and green onions

allMenuItems.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
allMenuItems.description: Tandoori-roasted chicken pieces in a rich, creamy tomato-based curry sauce with aromatic Indian spices, served with naan bread and basmati rice

allMenuItems.name: Fish and Chips
allMenuItems.description: Beer-battered cod fillets fried until golden and crispy, served with thick-cut potato chips, tartar sauce, and malt vinegar

allMenuItems.name: Greek Moussaka
allMenuItems.description: Layered casserole with eggplant, spiced ground lamb, potatoes, and topped with creamy béchamel sauce, baked until golden brown

allMenuItems.name: Pho
allMenuItems.description: Vietnamese rice noodle soup with tender beef slices, aromatic herbs, bean sprouts, and rice noodles in a clear, flavorful bone broth

allMenuItems.name: Tacos
allMenuItems.description: Soft corn tortillas filled with seasoned meat, fresh onions, cilantro, and lime, topped with salsa verde or roja and optional guacamole

allMenuItems.name: Pasta Carbonara
allMenuItems.description: Classic Roman pasta dish with eggs, pecorino cheese, guanciale, and black pepper, creating a creamy sauce without using any cream

allMenuItems.name: Green Curry
allMenuItems.description: Thai coconut curry with green chilies, bamboo shoots, eggplant, and choice of meat or tofu, served with jasmine rice

allMenuItems.name: Dim Sum
allMenuItems.description: Variety of small Chinese dishes including dumplings, buns, and rolls, typically served in bamboo steamer baskets during yum cha

allMenuItems.name: Falafel
allMenuItems.description: Deep-fried balls made from ground chickpeas, herbs, and spices, served in pita bread with tahini sauce, hummus, and fresh vegetables

allMenuItems.name: Bibimbap
allMenuItems.description: Korean rice bowl topped with sautéed vegetables, marinated meat, gochujang sauce, and a fried egg, served in a hot stone bowl

allMenuItems.name: Croissant
allMenuItems.description: Flaky, buttery French pastry made through a lamination process, creating multiple layers that become light and airy when baked

allMenuItems.name: Butter Chicken
allMenuItems.description: Tandoori chicken pieces in a rich, creamy tomato-based curry sauce with butter and aromatic spices, served with naan bread

allMenuItems.name: Gyoza
allMenuItems.description: Japanese dumplings filled with ground meat and vegetables, pan-fried until crispy on the bottom and served with soy-vinegar dipping sauce

allMenuItems.name: Beef Stroganoff
allMenuItems.description: Russian dish of sautéed beef strips in a sour cream-based sauce with mushrooms and onions, served over egg noodles

allMenuItems.name: Ceviche
allMenuItems.description: Fresh raw fish cured in citrus juices, mixed with onions, chili peppers, and cilantro, served with sweet potato and corn

allMenuItems.name: Schnitzel
allMenuItems.description: Thinly pounded veal cutlet breaded and fried until golden brown, traditionally served with potato salad and lingonberry jam

allMenuItems.name: Mango Sticky Rice
allMenuItems.description: Thai dessert of sweet glutinous rice soaked in coconut milk, served with fresh ripe mango slices and topped with crispy mung beans

allMenuItems.name: Lasagna
allMenuItems.description: Italian pasta dish layered with meat sauce, ricotta cheese, mozzarella, and parmesan between sheets of pasta, baked until bubbly

allMenuItems.name: Peking Duck
allMenuItems.description: Chinese roasted duck with crispy skin, served with thin pancakes, scallions, cucumber, and hoisin sauce

allMenuItems.name: Gazpacho
allMenuItems.description: Traditional cold Spanish soup made with ripe tomatoes, cucumbers, peppers, and garlic, served with croutons and olive oil

allMenuItems.name: Churros
allMenuItems.description: Spanish fried dough pastry, coated in cinnamon sugar and served with thick hot chocolate or dulce de leche for dipping

allMenuItems.name: Shrimp Tempura
allMenuItems.description: Japanese-style battered and deep-fried shrimp, creating a light and crispy coating, served with tempura sauce and grated daikon

allMenuItems.name: Goulash
allMenuItems.description: Hungarian beef stew seasoned with paprika and other spices, cooked with carrots, potatoes, and tomatoes until tender

allMenuItems.name: Pad Kra Pao
allMenuItems.description: Thai holy basil stir-fry with minced chicken or pork, chili, garlic, served over rice and topped with a fried egg

allMenuItems.name: Risotto
allMenuItems.description: Italian rice dish slowly cooked in broth until creamy, often finished with butter, parmesan cheese, and various ingredients like mushrooms

allMenuItems.name: Samosas
allMenuItems.description: Indian triangular pastries filled with spiced potatoes, peas, and sometimes meat, deep-fried until golden and served with chutney

allMenuItems.name: French Onion Soup
allMenuItems.description: Rich beef broth with caramelized onions, topped with crusty bread and melted Gruyère cheese, baked until golden and bubbly

allMenuItems.name: Beef Rendang
allMenuItems.description: Indonesian slow-cooked beef in coconut milk and spices until tender and caramelized, traditionally served with rice

allMenuItems.name: California Roll
allMenuItems.description: Inside-out sushi roll with imitation crab meat, avocado, and cucumber, rolled in rice and topped with sesame seeds

allMenuItems.name: Tiramisu
allMenuItems.description: Italian dessert made with coffee-soaked ladyfingers layered with mascarpone cream and dusted with cocoa powder

allMenuItems.name: Spring Rolls
allMenuItems.description: Fresh Vietnamese rolls with rice noodles, shrimp, pork, herbs, and vegetables wrapped in rice paper, served with peanut dipping sauce

allMenuItems.name: Greek Souvlaki
allMenuItems.description: Grilled skewers of marinated meat served in pita bread with tomatoes, onions, and tzatziki sauce

allMenuItems.name: Eggs Benedict
allMenuItems.description: Poached eggs and Canadian bacon on English muffins, topped with hollandaise sauce and served with breakfast potatoes

allMenuItems.name: Tom Kha Gai
allMenuItems.description: Thai coconut soup with chicken, mushrooms, galangal, lemongrass, and lime leaves, finished with chili oil and cilantro

allMenuItems.name: Fish Tacos
allMenuItems.description: Battered and fried fish in corn tortillas with cabbage slaw, Mexican crema, and pico de gallo

allMenuItems.name: Beef Pho
allMenuItems.description: Vietnamese rice noodle soup with sliced beef, herbs, and bean sprouts in a fragrant star anise and ginger-spiced broth

allMenuItems.name: Shakshuka
allMenuItems.description: North African dish of eggs poached in spicy tomato sauce with peppers and onions, served with crusty bread for dipping

allMenuItems.name: Pad See Ew
allMenuItems.description: Thai stir-fried wide rice noodles with Chinese broccoli, eggs, and choice of meat in sweet soy sauce

allMenuItems.name: Crème Brûlée
allMenuItems.description: French vanilla custard dessert topped with caramelized sugar that creates a brittle crust when cracked

allMenuItems.name: Tandoori Chicken
allMenuItems.description: Indian yogurt-marinated chicken with spices, roasted in a clay oven until tender and charred, served with mint chutney

allMenuItems.name: Beef Tataki
allMenuItems.description: Japanese appetizer of briefly seared beef sliced thin, served with ponzu sauce, green onions, and garlic chips

allMenuItems.name: Spanakopita
allMenuItems.description: Greek savory pastry made with layers of flaky phyllo dough filled with spinach, feta cheese, and herbs

allMenuItems.name: Korean BBQ
allMenuItems.description: Assorted marinated meats grilled at the table, served with banchan side dishes, lettuce wraps, and dipping sauces

allMenuItems.name: Poke Bowl
allMenuItems.description: Hawaiian dish of diced raw fish, rice, seaweed, cucumber, avocado, and various toppings with soy-sesame dressing

allMenuItems.name: Beef Wellington
allMenuItems.description: Beef tenderloin coated with mushroom duxelles and wrapped in prosciutto and puff pastry, baked until golden brown

allMenuItems.name: Borscht
allMenuItems.description: Ukrainian beet soup with cabbage, potatoes, and other vegetables, served hot or cold with sour cream and fresh dill

allMenuItems.name: Xiaolongbao
allMenuItems.description: Shanghai soup dumplings filled with pork and flavorful gelatinized broth that becomes liquid when steamed

allMenuItems.name: Lamb Tagine
allMenuItems.description: Moroccan slow
